title: Ticket #3142: Standard universe/checkpointing: complain if not run under setarch
description: Condor's checkpointing requires that it be run under "setarch -L -R -B" (or its programmatic equivalent). If you don't do so, you get cryptic crashes. Ideally the checkpointing library should detect that things are not set correctly and should refuse to run, or at least emit an error.
creator: adesmet
